comment.author: 62751749@N03
comment._content: This is my grandfather Manny. He spelled his name "Emanuel". Anyone with other photos, please be in touch.

comment.author: 62751749@N03
comment._content: I have photos!  Come over and look.  I am Manny's daughter (the other one!)  Isn't it great.  I know Grandpop would be very proud to find his photo on this site.
